entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 14.
entry.summary: Rain ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 this afternoon. High 14. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Monday 1 May 2023
